item.title: modelbuilder - Building and analysis of compartmental mechanistic models without coding
item.description: We are developing an R package that allows users to build and analyze compartmental, dynamical, mechanistic models (implemented as differential equations, discrete-time or stochastic), without the need to write computer code. Learn more about it on the package website.
